author: iSazonov
body:
Replace Process.GetCurrentProcess().MainModule.FileName with new API Environment.ProcessPath
(We use this only in test tools.)

https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/issues/42948

We will get the API only after we move to .Net 6.0 Preview1.

comments.author: msftbot[bot]
comments.body:
:tada:This issue was addressed in #15012, which has now been successfully released as `v7.2.0-preview.7`.:tada:

Handy links:
* [Release Notes](https://github.com/PowerShell/PowerShell/releases/tag/v7.2.0-preview.7)

title: Use Environment.ProcessPath API
